abstract_summ: Study looked at SARS-CoV-2 specific cellular and humoral immune status in patients with different COVID-19 severities . Significantly diminished frequencies of CD8+T-cells, CD4+ and CD8-T-cell subsets with activated differentiated memory/effector phenotype and migratory capacity were found in . patients with severe and/or critical COV-19 as compared to patients with moderate disease .
